article_title: NMSU-Utah Valley game ends in brawl as fans storm court
article_text:
After time expired to end the college basketball game between New Mexico State and Utah Valley, NMSU player K.C. Ross-Miller sparked a brawl after he threw a ball at Utah Valley’s Holton Hunsaker in the 66-61 overtime loss.

Things turned ugly quick as fans stormed the court to celebrate the win. Read the full story here.
